[Infection Prevention Priority Period] This class will be conducted as a simultaneous two-way class via Zoom (URL: https://us06web.zoom.us/j/88458378453?pwd=REpVZ2lCZDk5K2doZ1U0T2RQZkd1dz09 ) from April 21 (Session 2) until further notice.

This course meets once per week and will be conducted in English only. Students will study expectations of both correspondence and report writing for business purposes. Preparation before class—reading the textbook, doing practice activities, and doing writing tasks on computer and submitting them in a proper format—is essential. In class, there will be some lecture, pair work (particularly for peer review of writing), feedback, and limited writing time. Currently, this class is intended to be taught face-to-face; adjustments may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies.
(Information only for students who have received permission from university to take classes online): Class sessions will be held simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast. A permanent link to the Zoom session will be updated in the syllabus after student registration and verification of online registrants is done.
